ruleBookInfo.author: @get:{a}
ruleBookInfo.init:
@put:{n:"[property$=book_name]@content",
a:"[property$=author]@content",
t:"[property~=category|status]@content",
l:"[property$=latest_chapter_name]@content",
i:"[property$=image]@content",
o:"[property$=description]@content",
g:"[property$=update_time]@content",
z:"class.t_c.2@text##字数："
}
ruleBookInfo.name: @get:{n}

ruleContent.replaceRegex: ##.*{{source.key}}.*|\n+.*章节错误,点此举报.*\n+|\(https?.*\/book\/.*\)|.*首发域名.*
